Text: FW For Andy LewisAndy Yvan a candidate for our ENA Trading Track program wanted me to forward this message to you Regards Todd Peikert Original Message From yvan go mailto Sent Tuesday October AM To Peikert Todd Subject For Andy Lewis Hi Todd Appreciate if you can forward this mail to Andy Sincerely Yvan From To Subject Delivery Status Notification Failure Date Mon Oct This is an automatically generated Delivery Status Notification Delivery to the following recipients failed Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at bqlhmtagitlENasp Inline attachment follows From To Date Tuesday October GMT Subject Dear Andy Let me thank you for your time last Monday I never realized that the phone conversation lasted for about hour and minutes Indeed it was a reconfirmation of what I have read and understood to be the Gas and Power Business More than anything else I have learned a lot from that conversation I appreciate your thoughts on trading natural gas in particular and your experiences at Enron in general To bigger volumes and larger revenues Sincerely Yvan Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at bqlhmtagitlENasp

Rotation Rolloff Dates for Associate CandidatesApst Tom I have included the information that I received from the potential candidates regarding their Rolloff Dates By in large all seem to be willing to be flexible with regards to a start date if it could be negotiated with their current rotational head Name Rolloff Date Notes Cornett Justin June NA Feitler Eric August NA Jacobellis Steven End of JulyStart of August NA Khoja Ali Mid June Considering an option to stay with EBS as a Manager but would entertain an opportunity in the Texas Gas Trading area Singh Inderpal June Technically finished with his current rotation but in the midst of a deal scheduled to close the third week of June Williams Bryan Start of July NA Regards Todd Peikert x

FW Final Schedule Thursday October Kevin SimmonsBarry Per your request I have attached a schedule and Kevins resume to review Regards Todd Original Message From Delgado Lydia Sent Wednesday October PM To Peikert Todd Subject Final Schedule Thursday October Kevin Simmons Importance High Attached please find the following documents Thank you Lydia Delgado x

Redeployment Candidates Cc Barry As promised here are some of the current redeployment candidates that have a marketingstructuringtrading background for consideration concerning your West Origination opening I believe that you have seen Jim Lowe before and expressed some limited interest in him The other candidates are most likely new to you Let me know if you would like to pursue any of these redeployed employees Also I spoke with Mark McConnell today and he mentioned that he had accepted the offer to join the Transwestern group of ETS He primary motivation for selection of this option was his desire to work with asset deals As we know given EWS asset light approach to deal making this option would be difficult to fulfill within the West Origination group However he mentioned that he was very impressed with your group and short of the asset piece maintained a high interest in your open position Regards Todd Peikert

Candidate Todd Neugebauer Cc Barry Thanks for the updates on the previous candidates I am forwarding the resume of Todd Neugebauer from EBS London Todd is a manager in the origination group who is currently searching for potential opportunities in the States He can be reached at the numbers as listed below Let me know if you are interested as Todd will be in Houston next week if you would care to meet with him in person Regards Todd Peikert Original Message From Neugebauer Todd Sent Wednesday September AM To Peikert Todd Subject Resume Per your request here is a copy of my resume As I mentioned on our call I am planning to be in Houston later next week and would be available to meet with members of the group then possibility I may be in all week If that doesnt work I am definitely able to speak by phone Regards Todd Todd Neugebauer Enron Broadband Services Enron House Grosvenor Place London SWX EN Direct Tel Fax Mobile wwwenronnet
